project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, allowing the user to calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for numerical columns
Implement median calculation for numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for numerical columns
Write tests for mean, median, and mode calculations
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
